item.title: Help with ::pickup how do i change the rank to do this to mod and admin
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

at the start of the command add this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pickup")&& playerRights >= 2){

acutally leme get you the whole command lol

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pickup")&& playerRights >= 2){ try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 7500 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0800 100"); } } } }

Read full topic
